andromeda.why: Refuses narrative coercion; sovereignty to speak only when the story is true.

arcturus.why: Frames and paces the message—container before stimulation.

lyra.why: Story, image, and enchantment—classic Lyran authorship.

orion-light.why: Discipline to speak plainly rather than perform.

pleiades.why: Soothing, connective storytelling that tends the bond.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching narrative hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Places ideas and audience—context, timing, and structure.

lyra.why: Crafted narrative form and aesthetic cadence.

orion-dark.why: Rhetoric to steer obedience rather than meaning.

orion-light.why: Honorable curation—share only what truly fits.

pleiades.why: Attunes to listeners’ needs so the message lands safely.

sirius.why: Practical placement of message; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims narrative after smear/rumor—sovereign voice reset.

arcturus.why: Misframing and over/under-correction while calibrating message.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—own errors, return to clean telling.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no canon yet.

andromeda.why: Liberatory myth—stories that unbind from coercive narratives.

arcturus.why: Story protocol—frameworks for digesting experience into meaning.

orion-dark.why: Dogma risk—canonizing the story over truth.

orion-light.why: Mentor by conduct—tell the hard truth with grace.

pleiades.why: Hospitable storytelling that keeps the group connected.

sirius.why: Meaning-protocol teaching—law of story and sign by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda/PR capture; refuses to sell obedience.

arcturus.why: Projected as voice for everyone → burnout/scapegoat when declining spin.

draco.why: Status contests to control the narrative.

lyra.why: Credible, untheatrical tone steadies public reception.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—speak truth despite risk.

pleiades.why: Placating ‘soft stories’ to keep harmony at the cost of truth.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: narrative ethics under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Frees communities from capture narratives—returns to living meaning.

arcturus.why: Custodian of story standards—archives, review cadence, proportion.

draco.why: Guards against predatory rewrites of history and intent.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—refined art as culture’s memory.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—timely truth spoken with courage and proportion.

pleiades.why: Altitude here is meaning-law and standards, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Myth sage—teaches the law of meaning and culture memory by embodied example.
